title: Is there an Eqivalent to Fontexplorer for the PC yet??
author: kamolahy

comments.content:
You can try the beta: [http://www.softpedia.com/get/Others/Font-Utils/Font-Explorer.shtml](http://web.archive.org/web/20150425030241/http:/www.softpedia.com/get/Others/Font-Utils/Font-Explorer.shtml "http://www.softpedia.com/get/Others/Font-Utils/Font-Explorer.shtml")  
Or wait for the new release, which is supposed to be completely rewritten.
